display_long_description:
Scary Gorilla throws you into a creepy jungle playground where you are never really alone. By day, the ruins feel like a normal monkey-tag arena. By night, a huge, angry gorilla wakes up and starts hunting anything that moves. You’ll have to climb walls, swing across gaps, and use pure movement skill to stay ahead of it.

Built around physics-based movement, you pull yourself along with your hands and scramble up trees, rocks, and broken temples. The more noise you make, the easier it is for the gorilla to track you. Lights flicker, bushes rustle, and you’ll hear heavy breathing right behind you if you slip up.

Play solo and try to survive as long as possible, or jump into multiplayer lobbies where one player becomes the Scary Gorilla and everyone else tries not to get tagged. Matches are short, intense, and full of screaming and laughter as the gorilla bursts out of the dark at the worst possible time.

Features

Hand-based climbing and running inspired by tag-style VR games

Dynamic day / night cycle that switches between playful and terrifying

A huge hostile gorilla that reacts to sound, light, and player movement

Solo survival mode and multiplayer “gorilla vs survivors” lobbies

Multiple maps: jungle ruins, foggy canyon, underground caves, and more

Customizable skins and cosmetic items for both players and the gorilla

Run. Climb. Hide. In Scary Gorilla, the jungle is your playground… until it wakes up.
